publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3326 Mr Lloyd Quinan: MMR and TaqMan PCR Blood Test-That the Parliament recognises the recent findings of Professor John O'Leary following his use of the DNA blood test, Taqman PCR, which has provided further evidence of a link between the MMR vaccine and autism; believes that the Scottish Executive should provide funding to enable all autistic children to have this test on the NHS, and supports the family of Angus Kyle, who paid for this test privately, in its legal case against the manufacturers of the MMR vaccine.

S1M-3326 Mr Lloyd Quinan: MMR and TaqMan PCR Blood Test—That the Parliament recognises the recent findings of Professor John O’Leary following his use of the DNA blood test, Taqman PCR, which has provided further evidence of a link between the MMR vaccine and autism; believes that the Scottish Executive should provide funding to enable all autistic children to have this test on the NHS, and supports the family of Angus Kyle, who paid for this test privately, in its legal case against the manufacturers of the MMR vaccine.Supported by: Adam Ingram*
S1M-3326 MMR and TaqMan PCR Blood Test (lodged on 28 August 2002) Michael Matheson*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-3326 MMR and TaqMan PCR Blood Test (lodged on 28 August 2002) Fergus Ewing*, Alex Neil*
S1M-3326 MMR and TaqMan PCR Blood Test (lodged on 28 August 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3326 MMR and TaqMan PCR Blood Test (lodged on 28 August 2002) Stewart Stevenson*
S1M-3326 MMR and TaqMan PCR Blood Test (lodged on 28 August 2002) Ms Sandra White*, Robin Harper*
S1M-3326 MMR and TaqMan PCR Blood Test (lodged on 28 August 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
